chapter.text: You look around and spot the moonlight seeping in from the window.^1500 You’re known for sleeping in class, but you’ve never slept in this long.^1500 Usually the janitor would at least wake you up, but he hasn’t gotten to this room yet it seems.^1500 Wasn’t the first time that a student has been left well past the end of the day.^1500 Not a problem.
